entries.journal_entry_description: The final stage of the Zssik plan to overthrow the Blackscale clan is to make an assault on the Avatar Space Platform. The Avatar Space Platform can only be accessed by landing on it in the Kashyyyk space system.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Under the chaos of the Wookiee resistance attack, you must find Blackscale guard captains and collect five of their ID cards.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Zssik clan realizes that once it takes over from the Blackscale that the Wookiee resistance will be a major problem. Make sure that their leader never makes it off the station. Kill Harwakokok the Mighty.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You need to find out a way to destroy the Avatar Space Platform and then get off the station. You can probably find out this information on the station's technical readout terminal. Once you have this information follow those instructions and destroy the station.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Report your successful invasion of the Avatar Space Platform to Hssissk.
